title: 165: Ask Us Anything!
itunes:title: 165: Ask Us Anything!
description:
Today The Broads take a break from their typical episodes to catch up, have some laughs, and then answer some questions from the beloved #broadsquad! They chat about the filming of the Bachelorette, Kanye’s presidency announcement, their plans to run for office, #broadsquad member’s husbands coming home from deployment, how their families have handled their differences, Bekah’s bachelor auditions tips, open relationships, basic life skills they can’t do, and much more! 
**Questions that were not answered will continue to be answered in upcoming episodes! 
Join The Broads next week!
Tuesday: Recap of ABC’s Bachelor GOAT episode from 7/6 (1st Bachelor/1st Bachelorette)
Thursday: Special Guest! Won’t want to miss! 
FOLLOW US:
Chatty Broads - @chattybroads 
Bekah - @bekah
Jess - @thebaddmom 
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
PRETTY LITTER:  Prettylitter.com and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!
CARE/OF:For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com/chatty50 and enter code chatty50
SKILLSHARE: Get 2 free months of Premium Membership at Skillshare.com/CHATTY
AURATE: For 15% off your first Aurate purchase, go to AurateNewYork.com/broads and use promo code “Broads"
 
BEST FIENDS: Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
